column4: I'm not sure I can ask this question here.  Every time I try to install the flash plugin on Firefox on Ubuntu, It installs but the plugin doesnt work.  I've tried all three available.   Are there any knwon issues.  I've tried Ubuntu 8.04/8.10 and now i'm on the RC9.04
Where did you get the flash plugin? repositories?
should i download the instlaler form the adobe site?
Just go to adobe.com and dlownload the Ubuntu package for Flash. Its up to version 10.
